com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport

Class DateTimePropertyValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport.PropertyValue
      • com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport.CompoundPropertyValue
        • com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport.DateTimePropertyValue

  • public final class DateTimePropertyValue
extends CompoundPropertyValue
    A CompoundPropertyValue that represents the current date and time in the locale of the client, and the equivalent date and time in UTC.

    The value is a list of six strings, where the order is important:

    1. A string representation of the date and time that conforms to the "dateTime" XML data type.
    2. A string representation of the time zone identifier.
    3. (optional) A string representation of whether the date and time occurs during daylight saving time that conforms to the "boolean" XML data type.

      If this value is not set explicitly, it is inferred from the date and time, and the time zone identifier.

    4. (optional) A string representation of the date and time in UTC that conforms to the "dateTime" XML data type.
    5. (optional) A string representation of a calculated date and time that conforms to the "dateTime" XML data type.
    6. (optional) A string representation of whether a calculated date and time occurs during daylight saving time that conforms to the "boolean" XML data type.
    The final three strings are not mandatory; they are calculated on the server using the data that the client provides.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class com.i2group.apollo.model.schema.transport.CompoundPropertyValue

        getElements, getValue
